channel.title: How do you change your sources name?
channel.description: I was wondering how you change the name so when you log in it will say welcome to (name of your choice) Can anybody help?

item.title: How do you change your sources name?

item.description:

item.source: How do you change your sources name?

item.title: How do you change your sources name?
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

easy, goto client.java. then press ctrl+h then you can type the name of the source on the top box, then “yours” on the bottom, then press replace all… :D[br][size=1]Posted on: October 21, 2007, 03:23:38 PM[/size][hr]lol, i came in a sec to late…

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change your sources name?

item.title: How do you change your sources name?
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Open your client.java. Press Crtl+H. In the ‘find’ box put the sources current name. In the ‘replace with’ put the new name. Then press replace all.

Read full topic
